layoutsactive.label: Activate Layout Actions
layoutsactive.comment: If enabled, Sweet Tooth will load JavaScript and CSS files. It will also include most integrated content definitions. Please only change this option if you understand how it affects your store.

canUseRedemptionsIfNotLoggedIn.label: Guest Redemptions
canUseRedemptionsIfNotLoggedIn.comment: If enabled, customers will be able to begin to redeem points before they log-in. They will eventually have to log-in to complete their order either way.

doIgnoreCDWhenCR.label: Disable Earnings When Points Used In Catalog
doIgnoreCDWhenCR.comment: If enabled, the customer will not earn any catalog distribution points if the customer makes a catalog redemption for a particular item.

doIgnoreCDWhenSCR.label: Disable Earnings When Points Used In Cart
doIgnoreCDWhenSCR.comment: If enabled, the customer will not earn any catalog distribution points if the customer makes a shopping cart redemption for a particular shopping cart.

shopping_cart_rule_earn_after_discount.label: Give shopping cart distribution points based on subtotal after discount
shopping_cart_rule_earn_after_discount.comment: If enabled, customers will only be rewarded shopping cart distribution rule points based on the subtotal after any applied redemptions or discounts.

freeshipping_when_spending_points.label: Free shipping when spending points
freeshipping_when_spending_points.comment: If enabled, Sweet Tooth will give free shipping to customers when they are spending points.

showCartRedemptionsWhenZero.label: Show Zero Cart Redemptions
showCartRedemptionsWhenZero.comment: Show cart redemptions total row when no redemptions are present.

showCartDistributionsWhenZero.label: Show Zero Cart Earnings
showCartDistributionsWhenZero.comment: Show cart distributions total row when no distributions are present.

showSidebarIfNotLoggedIn.label: Show Sidebar When Not Logged In

noPointsCaption.label: Zero Points Caption
noPointsCaption.comment: What to show when the customer has 0 (zero) points.

rewardsCatalogNumProducts.label: # Products In Mini Rewards Catalog
rewardsCatalogNumProducts.comment: The number of products to show in the mini rewards catalog in the customer points management panel.

customer_summary_msg.label: Customer Account Summary Message
customer_summary_msg.comment: This message is displayed in the summary box for logged in customers. Default is no message (blank). HTML is valid here.

showSendPointsToAFriend.label: Show Send Points To A Friend
showSendPointsToAFriend.comment: Should the customer be given the option to send points to a friend in the customer account panel rewards section?

showMiniRedeemCatalog.label: Show Mini Redemption Catalog
showMiniRedeemCatalog.comment: Should the mini redemption catalog in the customer account panel rewards section?

showPointsOptimizer.label: Show Points Optimizer
showPointsOptimizer.comment: Show the 'as low as XXX with YYY points' message for each applicable product in the catalog product listing pages? This will only show if you have catalog redemption rules present that apply to a particular product.

showEarningGraphic.label: Show the earning graphic in the catalog

autointegration.label: Integrated Content
autointegration.comment:
Please Read: If 'yes' is selected, these options will attempt to integrate into your store view theme. If this does not work for your theme, or if you want to put the integrated content somewhere other than the default location, then set the option to 'no' and follow the manual integration instructions provided.
There are more integrated content spots than shown here. Please follow the complete integration guide to see all integrated content available.

header_points_balance.label: Customer points balance near top page links
header_points_balance.comment: Click here for manual integration instructions.

product_listing.label: Catalog product listing
product_listing.comment: Click here for manual integration instructions.

product_view_page_product_points.label: Product earned/spent section into product info pages
product_view_page_product_points.comment: Click here for manual integration instructions.

product_view_page_review_points.label: Points earned for writing a review in the product info pages
product_view_page_review_points.comment: Click here for manual integration instructions.

form_review_points.label: Points earned for writing a review in the review listing pages
form_review_points.comment: Click here for manual integration instructions.

product_view_page_tag_points.label: Points earned for tagging a product in the product info pages
product_view_page_tag_points.comment: Click here for manual integration instructions.

shopping_cart_under_coupon.label: Shopping cart spending rules interface in shopping cart
shopping_cart_under_coupon.comment: Click here for manual integration instructions.

customer_dashboard_summary.label: Points account summary in the customer dashboard
customer_dashboard_summary.comment: Click here for manual integration instructions.

InitialTransferStatus.label: Initial Transfer Statuses
InitialTransferStatus.comment: Note: You can set points to be automatically approved in the Order Fulfillment settings below.

shouldRemovePointsOnCancelledOrder.label: Automatically Remove Points On Cancel
shouldRemovePointsOnCancelledOrder.comment: When an order is cancelled, should the point transfers associated with these orders be revoked/cancelled as well?

shouldApprovePointsOnInvoice.label: Automatically Approve Points on Invoice
shouldApprovePointsOnInvoice.comment: Automatically approve all related point transfers when the customer pays for the order.

shouldApprovePointsOnShipment.label: Automatically Approve Points On Shipment
shouldApprovePointsOnShipment.comment: Automatically approve all related point transfers when the order has been shipped.

transferComments.label: Transfer Comments
transferComments.comment:
Note: These comments are what appears in the points transfer earning/spending history for customers and what appears in the points transfer history and management screens for the administrator.
Note: The order of each "%s" wildcard string matters.

reviewOrRatingEarned.label: Points earned for writing a review or rating a product

pollEarned.label: Points earned for participating in a poll

tellAFriendEarned.label: Points earned for telling a friend about a product

tagEarned.label: Points earned for tagging a product

newsletterEarned.label: Points earned for signing up to the newsletter

signupEarned.label: Points earned for signing up to the site

sendToFriend.label: Points sent to a friend
sendToFriend.comment: First %s: Reciever name. Second %s: Sender comments.

receiveFromFriend.label: Points received from a friend
receiveFromFriend.comment: First %s: Sender name. Second %s: Sender comments.

expired.label: Expired points balance transfer
expired.comment: First %s: Number of days since expired.

delay_days.label: Number of days before points balance expires

email_warning1_days.label: Number of days before first warning e-mail

email_warning1_template.label: E-mail template for first warning e-mail

email_warning2_days.label: Number of days before second warning e-mail

email_warning2_template.label: E-mail template for second warning e-mail

log_when_points_expire.label: Write expiry actions to log
log_when_points_expire.comment: Writes to var/log/rewards_expire.log when points expire for any customer or when an e-mail is sent

enable_paypal_checkout_fee.label: Enable PayPal Standard Tax-only Checkout Fee
enable_paypal_checkout_fee.comment: If this option is enabled, a 0.01 amount (in the base currency of the store) is added to the checkout total to allow the PayPal Standard checkout to proceed when the user is discounting the product completely and only paying for the remaining tax amount. This function is needed because PayPal Standard (Website Payments Standard) does not allow checkouts to occur if the customer is only paying for the tax amount.

migration.label: Migration Utilities
migration.comment: Please Note: You should only run these functions if you really know what you're doing or you are advised by a Sweet Tooth representative.

exportcampaign.label: Export Campaign
exportcampaign.comment: This will export point currencies, rules and Sweet Tooth configuration.

importcampaign.label: Import Campaign
importcampaign.comment: WARNING: THIS WILL ALSO DELETE ALL YOUR SWEET TOOTH RULES! - Select a .stcampaign file and click 'Save Config' to import.

importpoints.label: Import Points
importpoints.comment:
Select a .csv file and click 'Save Config' to import.
See guide on importing points from a CSV file here

help.label: Diagnostics & Support Tools
help.comment: Please Note: You should only run these functions if you really know what you're doing or you are advised by a Sweet Tooth representative.

reinstalldb.label: Re-run Database Scripts
reinstalldb.comment: When clicked, this will attempt to remove Magento's memory of the Sweet Tooth database components ever being installed. Magento will then attempt to re-install the database from scratch upon next access. This may help resolve issues with an abnormal installation or inconsistent database migration.

rundiagnostics.label: Run 'Test Sweet' Diagnostics
rundiagnostics.comment: When clicked, this will run a diagnostics utility that will tell you information about your store and check for any common problems that may occur on your store. When contacting our software support team, you should have this report handy.

registration.label: Registration Information
registration.comment: If you didn't install this module using CEM, this section is required.

modules_disable_output.comment: Note: Disabling output will not turn off module functionality and it will only turn off the _DISPLAY_ of the module(s).
